id: example-id ~ Will use folder name if not specified
name: Example Name ~ Will use folder name if not specified
summary: A brief description of the project.
repo: https://github.com/ExampleUser/Example-Repo OR /Example-Repo if github is specified in projects/config.json
thumbnail: /static/img/path-to-file/Example-Thumbnail.ext OR path-to-file/Example-Thumbnail.ext if thumbnail_root is specified in projects/config.json
banner: /static/img/path-to-file/Example-Banner.ext OR path-to-file/Example-Banner.ext if banner_root is specified in projects/config.json
buzzwords: You can use any alias specified
